name: Cloudy Kirby
description:
The objective of this game is to jump into the guys car to drive into the next level. 

Collect the 'life here' tokens to gain extra lives. Also collect the coins to acquire points and win the game!! Try your hardest to make it to the end of all the levels and to be able to float amongst the clouds !!

To Move up, down, right and left use the arrow keys. If you happen to run out of life you will be sent back to the start of all the levels.

Caution! There are sneak blocks that look like blocks but when you step onto them blocks will make you fall and you will have to restart the level!

Have fun playing my game hope you win! :)
